Precious Moloi-Motsepe (amụrụ 2 Ọgọst 1962)  bụ onye enyemaka na onye ọchụnta ego na South Africa
Otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị kacha baa ọgaranya na South Africa  ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ahụike, ọkachamara na ahụike ụmụaka na ụmụ nwanyị
Na Septemba 2019 a họpụtara ya dịka Chancellor nke Mahadum Cape Town, na-anọchi anya Graça Machel, wee malite ọchịchị afọ iri ya na 1 Jenụwarị
Na 2007, o guzobere African Fashion International

Ihe omume ahụ, ụlọ ọrụ ejiji na ụdị ndụ iji kwalite ndị na-emepụta uwe Africa nye ndị na-ege ntị na mba ụwa, na itinye ụlọ ọrụ ejiji Africa dị ka ụzọ maka mmepe akụ na ụba maka ndị ntorobịa na ụmụ nwanyị
N'afọ 2013, ya na di ya sonyeere 'Giving Pledge', na-agba mbọ inye ọkara nke akụ ezinụlọ ha maka ọrụ ebere
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ kwadoro mkpuchi mbu nke Forbes Women Africa  ma kemgbe ahụ a na-ewere ya dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị iri ise kachasị ike na kọntinent site na Forbes Magazine Africa
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya na mgbe niile na World Economic Forum nke emere na Davos,  yana onye so na bọọdụ ndu ụmụ nwanyị nke Harvard Kennedy School
Ọ na-anọdụkwa na Bọọdụ ndụmọdụ maka Milken Institute's Center for Strategic Philanthropy

Amụrụ ya na Soweto, ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụnne ise, nna ya bụ onye nkuzi ebe nne ya bụ nọọsụ  Ọ gara Mahadum Wits ebe ọ gụsịrị ma nweta nzere MBBCh na 1987  wee rụọ ọrụ na United States na kọleji ahụike nke Virginia na Richmond site na 1991 ruo 1992
Mgbe ọ laghachiri South Africa, ọ nwetara diplọma na ahụike ụmụaka na Mahadum Witwatersrand, yana diploma na ahụike ụmụ nwanyị na Mahadum Stellenbosch
Na 1989, ọ lụrụ Patrice Motsepe, ọkàiwu nke a zụlitekwara na Soweto
Forbes Magazine Africa mere atụmatụ na akụ na ụba ezinụlọ ya ruru ijeri dọla atọ wee chọpụta na ha bụ di na nwunye ịsị ojii kacha baa ọgaranya na South Africa
Ọ bụ onye Tswana
Na 1993 ọ mepere ụlọ ọgwụ ahụike ụmụ nwanyị na Rivonia, Johannesburg

Site na 2002 ruo 2007 ọ jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke Òtù Na-ahụ Maka Ọrịa Cancer nke South Africa (CANSA), na-enwetara ya Elizabeth Tshabalala Award maka mbọ ya n'ime ka ndị mmadụ mata ihe gbasara ọrịa kansa na 2012

Ya na di ya jikọtara tọọ ntọala nke Motsepe Foundation na 1999, na ebumnuche inye aka na ikpochapụ ịda ogbenye na ịkwalite ọnọdụ ibi ndụ na ụkpụrụ nke ibi ndụ nke ndị ogbenye, ndị na-enweghị ọrụ na ndị a na-ekewapu ekewapu na South Africa, Africa na ụwa niile

N'afọ 2002 ọ weghaara ọchịchị ya dị ka onye isi ọrụ  wee duru mmemme bụ isiokwu ise: agụmakwụkwọ na ibu onye ndu; nhata nwoke na nwanyị; mmepe obodo; egwuregwu, egwu na nka; na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya

N'afọ 2012, ọ butere ụzọ n'usoro atụmatụ mmefu ego nke Gender Responsive Budget Initiative, na-akwado maka nyocha na nyocha nke atụmatụ na usoro mmefu ego nke mba iji hụ na a na-egbo mkpa ụmụ nwanyị kpọmkwem na nha anya
Ndị nzuko omeiwu South Africa anabatala usoro mmefu ego nke a

N'afọ 2015, ndị Keep a Child Alive Foundation kwanyere ya na di ya ugwu maka mbọ ha na-agba n'ịgbasa okwu gbasara ahaghị nhata nke ọha na eze na akụ na ụba nke ndị ogbenye Africa, na maka nkwado ha na-emesapụ aka nke atụmatụ HIV na AIDS kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ
N'afọ 2017, o bipụtara akwụkwọ a kpọrọ The Precious Little Black Book iji mee ka ụmụ nwanyị South Africa nwee ozi gbasara ikike ha, ahụike na ike akụ na ụba ha
N'iso nke a, ọ weghaara ikike n'aka Melinda Gates dị ka onye isi oche nke òtù ọrụ enyemaka ụmụ nwanyị zuru ụwa ọnụ a kpọrọ Maverick Collective na 2018
N'afọ 2020, o nyere nde rand ise nye Mahadum Cape Town site n'aka Motsepe Foundation
Enyere onyinye a, nke enyere na mmalite nke ọrịa COVID-19, iji nyere aka na nkwado mahadum, yana ịzụrụ laptọọpụ na data maka ụmụ akwụkwọ ịmaliteghachi mmụta n'ime oge

N'afọ 2021, o nyere ego nde rand abụọ ọzọ nye Mahadum Cape Town site na Motsepe Foundation, iji nyere ụmụ akwụkwọ gụchara akwụkwọ ha mana enweghị ike gụchaa wee nweta asambodo nzere ha n'ihi ụgwọ ụmụ akwụkwọ

N'afọ 2007, ọ chepụtara African Fashion International (AFI) dị ka igwe eji ejiji nke mba Africa mara mma  nke ga-eme ka ndị na-emepụta uwe Africa banye n'ahịa mba ụwa wee mepụta ohere maka ịmepụta ọrụ n'akụkụ usoro ọkọnọ
A maara AFI nke ọma maka mmepụta ejiji na ihe omume ndụ nke ụwa ma o tolitela na mpaghara azụmahịa nke ịntanet dị ka ndị na-emepụta ejiji na ngwa pụrụ iche sitere na Africa na ndị mba ọzọ

N'ịbụ ndị mbụ ejiji izu ikpo okwu na kọntinent nke Mercedes Benz na-akwado, izu nke Ejiji AFI bu nke nwegoro ndị nkiri dika Suzy Menkes nke Condé Nast International na Fern Mallis nke New York Fashion Week

N'afọ 2017, ọ bụ onye mbụ nwetara ihe nrite Franca Sozzani na United Nations na New York maka mbọ ọ na-agba iji kwalite ndị na-emepụta Africa site na ụlọ ọrụ ya na ịkwado ike nke ụmụ nwanyị e wepụrụ ewepu
Ugbu a ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ na Copenhagen Global Fashion Agenda Summit, na-akwalite itinye ego na-adigide na ejiji, ọ bụkwa naanị onye nnọchiteanya si Africa
